text: Johnny Parker was a rugby league footballer in the Australian competition, the New South Wales Rugby League. ==Playing career== Parker played eleven matches for Eastern Suburbs club in the years 1936 & '41. although not playing in the final series for the Tricolours that year, Parker was a member of the East's side that went unbeaten in winning the 1936 premiership. Parker also had one season playing for South Sydney in 1940, he played just the one match. ==References== ==Sources== * The Encyclopedia Of Rugby League; Alan Whiticker & Glen Hudson Category:Year of birth missing Category:Possibly living people Category:Australian rugby league players Category:Sydney Roosters players Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:South Sydney Rabbitohs players Category:Rugby league centres Category:Rugby league fullbacks
title: Johnny Parker (rugby league)
